titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4526) to provide for the addition of approximately 600 acres to the Manassas National Battlefield Park.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-854.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 302 - 101 (Record Vote No: 275).

bill.summary: 8/9/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4526 (Manassas National Battlefield Park).
